borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition at ground floor level; erection of a single storey extension to the side and rear of the existing back addition at first floor level, including erection of obscured glazed screening around part of the flat roof of the proposed ground floor extension in connection with its use as a terrace; erection of a single storey extension on top of the resultant back addition, at second floor level; erection of a rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height to match No. 46, and erection of obscured glazed screening around part of the resultant roof of the extended back addition at third floor level in connection with its use as a terrace; installation of replacement windows and doors to the side elevation of the existing back addition at ground and first floor levels.
decision_conditions: obsecure glazed installed prior to use
